scripts.test:ci_browser: aikido-pnpm run install:browser-tests && aikido-pnpm run test:browser
scripts.test:ci_all: aikido-pnpm run test:ci_fixtures && aikido-pnpm run test:ci_browser
scripts.release:latest:patch: aikido-pnpm version patch -m '[ci skip] Release %s' && aikido-pnpm run tag && aikido-pnpm run publish:latest
scripts.release:latest:minor: aikido-pnpm version minor -m '[ci skip] Release %s' && aikido-pnpm run tag && aikido-pnpm run publish:latest
scripts.release:latest:major: aikido-pnpm version major -m '[ci skip] Release %s' && aikido-pnpm run tag && aikido-pnpm run publish:latest
scripts.release:next:patch: aikido-pnpm --no-git-tag-version version prepatch && aikido-pnpm run publish:next
scripts.release:next:minor: aikido-pnpm --no-git-tag-version version preminor && aikido-pnpm run publish:next
scripts.release:next:major: aikido-pnpm --no-git-tag-version version premajor && aikido-pnpm run publish:next
scripts.release:next:update: aikido-pnpm --no-git-tag-version version prerelease && aikido-pnpm run publish:next
